transcript: as our current understanding exists of the universe the Sun is going to continue expand until it eventually engulfs the Earth and we all die in a heat death all of the stuff that we're going to do everything that you've ever done the books that I write the videos that I make will eventually all get melted into nothingness when we have this worry that one of our videos or our post didn't get a lot of likes it just really doesn't matter I'm not saying that I don't feel the feelings I'm saying I remind myself of these things so that I don't feel them as much or as long
